description: This course provides a hands-on experience of laboratory techniques, with a focus on diagnostic pathology and infectious diseases of small, large and exotic animals. Participants will have the opportunity to work in a laboratory, to prepare specimens for pathological analysis, to acquire skills for the basic interpretation of diagnostic samples, to effectively operate with equipment and instruments commonly used in diagnostic pathology and infectious diseases, and to apply clinical pathology knowledge to the analysis and interpretation of cytologic, haematologic and clinical chemistry samples.
